title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Studies.  Landscapes near Guaranda, Ecuador.", June 4, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and traces of white gouache on cream-colored paper
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped in ink at lower right: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right: Near Guaranda June 4th 57 / Part of O.
description: Horizontal distant view of a valley with a stream and houses between the foothills is shown in the right middle plane.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Studies.  Landscapes near Guaranda, Ecuador.", June 4, 1857.
June 4, 1857. Graphite, brush and traces of white gouache on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-719-b.
